product_name: Ultrathon SUN-2TB Sunscreen - SPF 50 - 2 fl. oz. - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Ultrathon SUN-2TB Sunscreen provides reliable broad-spectrum protection against UV rays so you don't have to worry while you have fun in the sun. Broad-spectrum sunscreen protects against sunburn with high UVB protection and protects against the effects of aging and skin damage with high UVA protection. Ultrathon SUN-2TB SPF 50 sunscreen is water resistant for up 80 min. Closeout.
short_description: Ultrathon SUN-2TB Sunscreen provides reliable broad-spectrum protection against UV rays so you don't have to worry while you have fun in the sun.
